title: Series2Graph
authors: Paul Boniol, Themis Palpanas, Mohammed Meftah, Emmanuel Remy

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: Size of the sliding window (paper: `l`), independent of anomaly length, but should in the best case be larger.

parameters.name: query_window_size
parameters.description: Size of the sliding windows used to find anomalies (query subsequences). query_window_size must be >= window_size! (paper: `l_q`)

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: Number of angles used to extract pattern nodes. A higher value will lead to high precision, but at the cost of increased computation time. (paper: `r` performance parameter)
